properties.title: HIGH END | WATERFRONT  | BURJ KHALIFA VIEW
properties.description:
Luxe by T R P E Real Estate is proud to introduce this stunning 4-bedroom residence located in the iconic Eywa Tower, set in the dynamic heart of Business Bay, Dubai.

Property Highlights:
-Expansive, thoughtfully crafted living space
-Generously proportioned bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
-Premium-quality finishes throughout
-Floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing spectacular city views
-Impressive timber entrance door
-Sophisticated natural stone and artisanal plaster detailing
-Striking double-height reception area
-Multiple intimate and stylish seating zones
-Outdoor lounge areas featuring a serene waterfall
-Swimming pool, jacuzzi, and luxury spa
-Fully equipped gym and yoga space
-Exclusive clubhouse and tranquil relaxation lounge
-Enchanting Crystal Garden and outdoor bar
-Dedicated children’s play area
-24/7 security ensuring comfort and safety

Connectivity:
-8 minutes to Dubai Mall & Burj Khalifa
-10 minutes to Jumeirah Beach
-15 minutes to Dubai Marina
-15 minutes to Dubai International Airport (DXB)

Flexible Payment Plan:
-60% during construction
-40% upon completion
-Estimated handover: Q2 2026

Eywa, The Tree Of Life, represents a new standard in luxury real estate development, where well-being, sustainability and community are at the forefront.

properties.title: 4 BR Sea View Apartment in Armani Beach
properties.description: Discover an extraordinary 4-bedroom apartment for sale at Armani Beach Residences, nestled in the iconic Palm Jumeirah. This stunning 7,191 sq ft furnished unit offers unparalleled waterfront living with breathtaking sea views. Priced at 57,500,000 AED, this property represents a rare opportunity to own a piece of Dubai's most prestigious man-made island. Enjoy premium amenities including a shared pool, gym, spa, concierge services, and children's play area. Unit B-401 provides modern comfort with built-in wardrobes, central AC, covered parking, and a private balcony. Located in a family-friendly community with exclusive beach access, this apartment combines luxury, convenience, and spectacular Arabian Gulf panoramas. Experience the vibrant Palm Jumeirah lifestyle, just moments away from world-class dining, entertainment, and stunning architectural marvels. A perfect home for those seeking sophistication and tranquility in the heart of Dubai.

properties.title: Waterfront 3 BR Apartment in Armani Beach
properties.description: Discover an exceptional 3-bedroom apartment for sale in the prestigious Armani Beach Residences at Palm Jumeirah, priced at 39,000,000 AED. This spacious 4,872 sq ft unfurnished unit offers an unparalleled waterfront living experience in Dubai's most iconic man-made island. Enjoy breath-taking views of the Arabian Gulf and Dubai skyline from your private balcony. The property features premium amenities including a shared pool, gym, spa, and children's play area. With covered parking and stunning water views, this apartment provides the perfect blend of comfort and luxury. Located in a family-friendly community with private beach access, world-class dining, and proximity to top attractions like Atlantis, this property represents an extraordinary opportunity for discerning buyers seeking an exceptional lifestyle in one of Dubai's most sought-after locations.

The Ocean Mansions’ gardens offer three distinct planting styles, each crafted for a unique sense of immersion. Whether you prefer the serene elegance of a timeless design, the organic charm of nature landscapes, or the lush vibrancy of coastal greenery, these gardens cater to every aesthetic and lifestyle, transforming outdoor spaces into personalized sanctuaries of beauty, tranquillity, and connection to nature

Jumeirah Asora Bay at La Mer is the latest masterpiece by the esteemed Meraas, offering an exquisite collection of luxury 4 to 7-bedroom residences and high-end penthouses in the heart of Jumeirah. This architectural marvel embodies the essence of beachfront sophistication, seamlessly blending opulence with the tranquil allure of waterfront living.

properties.title: Luxurious Penthouse | High ROI | 60/40 PHPP
properties.description:
T R P E Real Estate is thrilled to offer this luxury residences with medical-grade wellness 6-bedroom Penthouse in Akala Residences, DIFC Dubai.

Property features & amenities:
- Floor-to-ceiling windows
- Premium bathroom fittings
- Private balcony with city views
- Modern kitchen with high-quality appliances
- Formative luxury gym
- LEED Gold & WELL Silver certified
- Private cinema
- Exclusive lounge space
- Akala Spa
- Wellness clinic and spa
- Cardio zone
- Private coaching pods
- Cycling studio
- Indoor lap pool
- Yoga
- Pilates
- Heated pool and meditation studios
- Boutique retail
- Everwell Medical Wellness Clinic

Payment plan:
- 10% Down Payment
- 50% Pre-Handover
- 40% On Handover
- Handover : Q4 2029

Akala Hotels and Residences in Za’abeel 2, Dubai offers 1 to 5-bedroom luxury apartments. This 50-storey tower features panoramic city views, premium amenities, and hotel-inspired services, blending elegance, comfort, and hospitality.

Akala stands as a revolutionary dual-tower development in the heart of Dubai’s financial and downtown districts, seamlessly blending ultra-luxury living with precision wellness. Inspired by the ancient Sanskrit word meaning “beyond time,” Akala is designed to elevate health, longevity, and performance through future-facing design, technology, and an intuitive service experience. Each of Akala’s towers rises 220 meters, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Burj Khalifa, Downtown Dubai, and DIFC.

properties.title: Waterfront 3 BR Apartment in Armani Beach
properties.description: Discover an exceptional 3-bedroom apartment for sale in the prestigious Armani Beach Residences at Palm Jumeirah, priced at 41,000,000 AED. This stunning 5,124 sq ft unfurnished unit on the 3rd floor offers an unparalleled waterfront living experience. Boasting breathtaking water views, the property features an array of premium amenities including a private gym, balcony, central AC, and covered parking. Residents enjoy exclusive access to shared facilities like a spa, children's play area, and pool. Located on the world's largest man-made island, this property provides a unique lifestyle with stunning Arabian Gulf and Dubai skyline perspectives. The community offers private beach access, water sports, and proximity to top-tier restaurants and entertainment. Perfect for those seeking a sophisticated urban retreat with serene waterfront living, this apartment represents an extraordinary opportunity in one of Dubai's most coveted locations.
